Reviews.Title: “Mixed experience”
Reviews.Author: CarolNburgh
Reviews.Content: worried smelled smoky heat third stayed broken towel rack beds firm breakfast included eggs ham cheeses fruit pastries cappuccino motelstyle private covered outdoor sitting enclosed hedges exactly garden nice touch shuttle subway frequent arrive schedule computer cable fee wifi lobby free pleased oh theres pizza road left locals flavors prices

Reviews.Title: “Breakfast is not so well!”
Reviews.Author: tea_peco
Reviews.Content: breakfast sweet instead boiled eggs chicken ham cheese shuttle service nice pick especially weekend rest sleeper choose hotel cause plains wake clean day beds okay sleep pasta hotel restaurant worth try delicious

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to relax”
Reviews.Author: borimir
Reviews.Content: loved loved kitchen loved garden loved hotel shuttle nice hotel probably nicer hot summer days perfect relax day walking rome dont rome car convenient using shuttle metro city center helpful staff especially shuttle driver rich fresh tasty breakfast else week stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel Outside the City”
Reviews.Author: Jon G
Reviews.Content: loved stay car driving city tourists terrible parking hotel train station regular shuttles probably fine choice dont car clean deluxe double nice modern design style

Reviews.Title: “OK airport hotel”
Reviews.Author: paulhempstock
Reviews.Content: reason stay unless flight ciampino transfers airport transfers metro station infrequent hot walk walk outside hotel grounds sound proofing motelstyle noise aircraft call strip patio outside door private garden bit stretch breakfast reasonable wifi

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel outside Rome”
Reviews.Author: Anega
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel partner 8 months baby night hotel outside city own car shuttle service metro train station hotel nicely decorating beautiful surroundings nice swimming pool breakfast little bit noisy landing aircrafts 10 mins ciampino airport comfortable

HotelInfo.Name: Piccolo Borgo
